title: Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger               Be A Junior Ranger         NPS Photo by Sheena Grabski  Junior Ranger Activity Book Earn a junior ranger badge or patch by obtaining our Junior Ranger Activity Book from the visitor center. Complete the activities in the book and then check in with a ranger at the desk. The average time for kids to complete the junior ranger book is 2 hours. Download the Junior Ranger Book                Junior Ranger Explorer Pack Check out a free explorer pack filled with fun things like a magnifying glass, a compass, a thermometer, colored pencils, etc. Explore the park with your family and check back in the pack to earn a Junior Ranger Badge.
